column4: I'm finding myself questioning why have I installed ubuntu in vmware environment without trouble and did the same with ubuntu server, but this time the graphcal system did not work at the first time
I really like the command line, but there are some circunstances where a graphical interface is welcome, even in a server environment
for example a server that hosts virtual machines
is disagree, most server's are set up and forgotten about, you shouldn't have to access it too much. So a GUI is a waste of resources
